version_description:
Lots of lovely improvements!
Thanks for your feedback and keep it coming!

Nifty improvements!
Making word search and crosswords more fun!

Lots of new Puzzling Levels!
The usual bug fix or two.

► 240 New levels
► Last word highlight for tough to see spots
► Thanks for your tremendous support!

► Daily Puzzles! Collect Cool Critters!
► 240 New levels
► The usual bug fixes
► Thanks for your tremendous support!

► 400 New levels
► The usual bug stomping
► Keep the great feedback coming!

► Lots more levels!
► Our players are the greatest! We love you!
► More bugs eliminated

• Cool new fixes and iPhone X ready!
• Over 800 million puzzles solved! Help us make it to 1 billion!

• Cool new fixes and iPhone X ready!
• Over 800 million puzzles solved! Help us make it to 1 billion!
1,200 new levels, update graphical effects, and bug fixes. Thank you for your support in solving over 1 billion puzzles! Happy Holidays!

New Hint Types!
Bullseyes lets you pick where you want to reveal a letter.
Rockets reveal multiple letters at once.
Spelling Bees reveal a letter AND enable bonus coins.
